summary: 2018 SHADOW 2H KING PRO STRAIGHT LOAD. CONSUMER WRITES IN REGARDS TO DEFECTIVE TRAILER TIRES. *LD    THE CONSUMER STATED THE BACK DOOR CLOSURE ON THE RAMP EXPOSED A BOLT THAT TORE OFF THE HORSE'S SHOE. THE BACK LIGHT ABOVE THE DOOR WAS NOT SCREWED IN PROPERLY AND NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE FAN  BRACKET ON THE LEFT SIDE OF THE HORSE'S HEAD NEEDED TO BE REPLACED.  *JS
